tasks_output.description: You are given the following structured medical data in a nested JSON format below:  {"patient_form": {"patient_data": {"phase1_basic_intake": {"demographics": {"age": 42, "biological_sex": "male", "biological_sex_other": null, "height_feet": 5, "height_inches": 10, "weight_lbs": 185, "ancestry": ["Caucasian"], "ancestry_other": null}, "medical_history": {"diagnoses": ["hypertension", "elevated_lipids"], "diagnoses_years": {"hypertension": "2021", "elevated_lipids": "2023"}, "diagnoses_other": null, "surgeries": null}, "medications": {"current_medications": [{"name": "Atorvastatin", "dose": "10 mg", "frequency": "Daily", "purpose": "Cholesterol"}], "has_medications": true}, "supplements": {"current_supplements": [{"name": "Ashwagandha", "dose": "600 mg", "frequency": "Daily", "purpose": "Stress resilience"}, {"name": "L-theanine", "dose": "200 mg", "frequency": "As needed", "purpose": "Focus, calm"}, {"name": "Omega-3", "dose": "1500 mg", "frequency": "Daily", "purpose": "Cardiometabolic support"}], "has_supplements": true}, "allergies": {"known_allergies": [], "has_allergies": false}, "complementary_approaches": {"selected_approaches": ["functional"], "functional_medicine": true, "ayurveda": false, "traditional_chinese_medicine": false, "homeopathy": false, "korean_medicine": false}, "wearable_devices": {"fitbit": false, "apple_watch": true, "google_pixel_watch": false, "oura_ring": true, "samsung_galaxy_watch": false, "other_device": null, "has_any_wearables": true}}, "phase2_detailed_intake": {"family_medical_history": {"has_family_history": true, "conditions_detail": {"heart_attack": ["grandfather_paternal"], "high_blood_pressure": ["father"]}, "other_conditions_text": null}, "medication_side_effects": {"has_adverse_reactions": false, "reaction_details": null}, "childhood_antibiotics": {"took_antibiotics_as_child": true}, "lifestyle_factors": {"tobacco": {"use_status": "never", "quit_year": null, "duration_category": null}, "alcohol": {"frequency": "sometimes", "typical_amount": "2_4_per_month"}, "recreational_drugs": {"uses_substances": false, "substance_details": null}}, "occupation_wellness": {"job_title": "Founder/CEO", "work_stress_level": 9}, "physical_activity": {"exercise_days_per_week": 3}, "sunlight_exposure": {"days_per_week": 4, "average_minutes_per_day": 20}, "sleep_patterns": {"hours_category": "6_to_8", "trouble_falling_asleep": true, "trouble_staying_asleep": true, "night_wake_frequency": 2, "night_urination_frequency": "3_4_per_week"}, "childhood_development": {"born_via_c_section": "no", "high_sugar_childhood_diet": "yes"}, "dental_health": {"mercury_fillings_removed": false, "removal_timeframe": null, "daily_brush_floss": "both_daily", "dental_work": {"silver_mercury_fillings": 1, "gold_fillings": 0, "root_canals": 0, "implants": 0, "caps_crowns": 1, "other_dental_work": 0}}, "environmental_exposures": {"chemical_exposures": ["air_travel_fatigue"], "chemical_exposure_other": null, "mold_exposure": false}, "pets_animals": {"has_pets": false}, "systems_review": {"digestive_symptoms": "bloating"}, "reproductive_hormonal_health": {"male_specific": {"testosterone_therapy": "no"}, "female_specific": null}, "pain_and_skin_health": {"headaches": {"frequent_headaches_migraines": true, "headache_details": "Stress-triggered tension headaches weekly"}, "chronic_pain": {"has_chronic_pain": false, "pain_details": null}, "skin_health": {"has_skin_issues": false, "skin_condition_details": null}}}}}, "blood_report": {"Kit Type": "METABOLIC_EASY_DRAW", "Total Biomarkers": 40, "Order ID": 34, "Test Date": "2025-09-18T01:54:59.221Z", "Gender": "Male", "Apolipoprotein A1 (APOA1)": "190.98 mg/dL", "Apolipoprotein B (APOB)": "77.41 mg/dL", "Dehydroepiandrosterone Sulfate (DHEA-S)": "317.86 ug/dL", "HDL Cholesterol": "66.12 mg/dL", "% Hemoglobin A1C": "3.3 %", "High-Sensitivity CRP": "0.22 mg/L", "Iron": "100.42 ug/dL", "Calcium": "8.16 mg/dL", "C-Peptide": "2.6 ng/mL", "LDL Cholesterol": "127.53 mg/dL", "Testosterone, Total (Males)": "365.98 ng/dL", "Testosterone, Free (calc)": "11.31 ng/dL", "Ferritin": "113.35 ng/mL", "Triglycerides": "40.63 mg/dL", "Triglycerides:HDL Ratio": "1.29 ", "Total Cholesterol": "181.65 mg/dL", "25-(OH) Vitamin D": "97.88 ng/mL", "Total Cholesterol:HDL Ratio": "1.75 ", "Thyroid Stimulating Hormone (TSH)": "1.41 uIU/mL", "Total Protein": "5.2 g/dL", "Unsaturated iron-binding capacity test (UIBC)": "166.57 ug/dL", "Sex Hormone-Binding Globulin (SHBG)": "71.72 nmol/L", "Albumin": "6.58 g/dL", "Alanine Aminotransferase (ALT)": "30.87 U/L", "Aspartate Aminotransferase (AST)": "28.35 U/L", "eGFR": "86.9 mL/min/1.73 m2", "Creatinine": "1.19 mg/dL", "Lipoprotein (a)": "12.38 mg/dL", "Blood Urea Nitrogen (BUN)": "22.28 mg/dL", "Total Bilirubin": "0.97 mg/dL", "Direct Bilirubin": "0.19 mg/dL", "BUN:Creatinine Ratio": "18.72 ", "% Free Testosterone": "3.09 %", "Estim. Avg Glu (eAG)": "48 mg/dL", "LDL-C:HDL-C Ratio": "1.92 ", "Calculated Cholesterol, Total": "201.77 mg/dL", "ApoB:ApoA1 Ratio": "0.4 ", "VLDL Cholesterol (Calc)": "8.12 mg/dL", "AST:ALT Ratio": "0.91 N/A", "LDL-C:ApoB Ratio": "1.64 N/A"}} Your job is to: Pass this input to the tool BiomarkerEvaluationInput, which returns analysis and threshold evaluations  for all relevant biomarkers. Identify and flag any biomarkers that are out of range, borderline, or clinically significant based on the tool’s output. The tool will return a severity for each biomarker, with 0 being perfectly healthy and 4 being the worst.  If the tool return a status of "no_data", you can analyze it by yourself.

tasks_output.expected_output:
A structured output that includes:
A list of flagged biomarkers, with reason and threshold ranges from the tool.

The output should reflect the *net weighted scores* assigned to each focus area (not flags). Each line must include the full name of the focus area, its code in parentheses, and the numeric score to two decimal places.
Example format: "Cardiometabolic & Metabolic Health (CM): 0.50" "Stress-Axis & Nervous System Resilience (STR): 0.50" "Hormonal Health (Transport) (HRM): 0.50"
Save the same text to focus_areas.md via the task's output_file.
tasks_output.name: evaluate_focus_areas
tasks_output.expected_output: A ranked list (highest score first) of focus areas in plain text with their codes and scores.
